title: Shorts: Jubilee Farm volunteer day
subtitle: Shorts: Jubilee Farm volunteer day
summary:
Jonny Hanson is an environmentalist who’s involved in setting up Northern Ireland's first Community-Supported Agriculture scheme, at Jubilee Farm. We’re going to be following their progress over the coming months. Jonny reports from Jubilee Farm’s first community volunteer day and provides a perspective on farming that’s I think a first for us on Farmerama.

This was originally published as part of episode 31 of Farmerama
